page.title: 11A One Day Reign.
page.content: Every year in July we have a carnival called Dicker Day when people come from Upper and Lower Dicker and the surrounding areas.The procession of floats assembles at Michelham Priory and travels through the village to the village field.I was to be king for a day. There were lots of tractors and trailers waiting to be judged.As we approached the field we saw hundreds of people lining the road.The queen and I opened the fete together and drew the tickets for the raffle.It was an enjoyable day and I felt very royal.
